structured_data.professional_summary: Aimee Hastings-James is a dedicated and driven emerging professional in the fields of Computer Science and Mathematics, set to graduate from St. Francis Xavier University in May 2025. With a solid foundation in programming languages such as Python, Java, and C++, alongside expertise in tools like Kubernetes, Terraform, and AWS, Aimee has already demonstrated remarkable aptitude in software development and platform engineering during her co-op roles with the Government of Canada. Her hands-on experience ranges from developing multi-team internal websites using Python and TypeScript to deploying critical tools for internal use, showcasing her ability to solve complex problems and deliver impactful results.

experience.job_title: Math, Statistics and Computer Science Learning Center Tutor
experience.responsibilities: Provided tutoring support in Math, Statistics, and Computer Science. Assisted students across various topics and challenges. Dedicated two hours weekly to help students overcome academic difficulties.
Set up internal tools, including JFrog Xray and OAuth2 Proxy. Collaborated with platforms utilizing Kubernetes, Terraform, and AWS. Enhanced problem-solving and platform integration skills.
Developed an internal multi-team website. Built back-end features using Python and front-end interfaces with TypeScript. Deployed solutions using Docker and Nginx.

experience.job_title: Banquet Server, Dishwasher and Rec Monitor
experience.company: New Castle Hotels and Resorts, Legendary Hospitality and Emera Oval
experience.responsibilities: Managed three distinct roles across six days a week. Improved multitasking and teamwork competencies. Adapted strategies to perform effectively in diverse environments.
Supervised and guided groups of six children on a weekly basis. Fostered personal growth and ensured an enriching camp experience. Contributed to the camp's exceptional community spirit.
Analyzed and evaluated introductory psychology essays for difficulty. Enhanced communication, computer, and active listening skills.
Hosted a 30-minute TV program featuring The Next Step Wild Rhythm Tour. Interviewed cast members and provided behind-the-scenes insights. Developed strong communication and presentation skills.

years_exp: 2 years of experience in Software Development and Platform Engineering
profile:
Aimee Hastings-James is an ambitious and highly skilled emerging professional in Computer Science and Mathematics, poised to graduate from St. Francis Xavier University in May 2025. With a strong academic foundation and hands-on experience, she has excelled in software development and platform engineering during her co-op placements with the Government of Canada. Aimee’s technical proficiency spans programming languages like Python, Java, and C++, as well as advanced tools such as Kubernetes, Terraform, and AWS. Her ability to design and deploy impactful solutions is evident in her development of internal multi-team websites and critical platform tools.

In addition to her technical expertise, Aimee demonstrates exceptional communication and problem-solving skills, fostered through diverse roles such as tutoring at St. Francis Xavier University and working as a banquet server, camp counselor, and TV presenter. Her adaptability and dedication shine through her ability to manage multiple responsibilities, such as tutoring students weekly in Math, Statistics, and Computer Science or guiding young campers to foster personal growth. Aimee’s versatility is further evident in her contributions to interdisciplinary projects, where she leverages her programming and leadership skills to deliver results.

As a proactive learner and collaborator, Aimee embodies teamwork and innovation, making her a valuable asset in any environment. Her extensive technical skill set, including ReactJS, Flask, Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure, is complemented by her commitment to personal and professional growth. With her proven track record in both academic and professional settings, Aimee is well-equipped to tackle complex challenges and create meaningful impact in the field of technology.
